sentences.en: Garment said the'sordid mess " had many dimensions.
sentences.cn: 加门特说, “ 这桩缺德事 ” 牵涉面很广.

sentences.en: He depicts the sordid and vulgar sides of life exclusively.
sentences.cn: 他只描写人生肮脏和庸俗的一面.

sentences.en: He sat with his head buried in his hands as his sordid double life was revealed.
sentences.cn: 自己卑鄙的双重生活被揭穿后，他双手抱头坐在那里。

sentences.en: He was sick of the sordid deal.
sentences.cn: 他厌恶这笔肮脏的交易.

sentences.en: I don't want to hear the sordid details of your relationship with Sandra.
sentences.cn: 我不想听你和桑德拉之间的那些龌龊细节。

sentences.en: I want no part of this sordid business.
sentences.cn: 我不想卷入这一卑鄙勾当.

sentences.en: I've washed my hands of the whole sordid business.
sentences.cn: 我已经洗手不干那种肮脏的勾当了.

sentences.en: It was a shock to discover the truth about his sordid past.
sentences.cn: 他以往的丑行被发现时，人们感到震惊。

sentences.en: It was material, sordid, deadly common - place.
sentences.cn: 这是庸俗 、 下流 、 平凡得要命的.

sentences.en: She listened to Kate'sexplanation of the sordid affair.
sentences.cn: 她听凯特对这件丑事作何解释。

sentences.en: The huts they lived in were sordid and filthy beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 他们住的小房真是异乎寻常地脏.

sentences.en: They lived in a sordid apartment.
sentences.cn: 他们住在肮脏的公寓房子里.

sentences.en: Unfortunately it was a rather sordid episode of my life.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，这是我人生中非常不光彩的一段经历。

sentences.en: When he repeated to me the sordid little scene I was outraged.
sentences.cn: 当他对我回述这幕令人作呕的丑戏时,我真是气坏了.

words.tran_cn: 污秽地；不洁地；下贱地；卑鄙地

trans.tran_cn: 肮脏的，污秽的，卑鄙的，邋遢的
